column4: Hi Guys! I have been effected by the bug in 12.04, because DVD is not automounted. Does somebody know a workaround? (It is definetly not a hardware error. It is tested.)
snowmanx11 adm cdrom sudo dip plugdev lpadmin sambashare
that looks fine. when you put the DVD in what is the output of "mount"
if I use k3b than everything is correctly mounted and able to eject
sometimes the mount work and dvd starts, but it is very rare
Mount failed: Error mounting: mount: no medium found on /dev/sr0
this is what I get usually
try /dev/dvd not sure what the device is
it is a known bug in 12.04
ok. then follow the bug report i guess
I had a well working 12.04. I have upgraded to 12.10 but it failed due to ATI vs new Xorg issue. Downgraded to 12.04 have this bug
